sentence.text: We examined a Japanese 54-years-old male patient with autosomal recessive intraciliary transport.

Through the examination of 48 candidate genes known to be responsible for autosomal recessive intraciliary transport, we identified a novel homozygous 4-bp deletion, c.914_917delGTAA, p.Ser305Ilefs*2 in exon2 of the positive regulation of mitochondrial fission gene encoding phosphatidic acid-preferring phospholipase A1 (PA-PLA1).
